LAPD plasma analysis

Welcome

The lapd-plasma-analysis repository was written by Leo Murphy and Michael Campagna based on code written in MATLAB by Conor Perks (MIT) and using the PlasmaPy and bapsflib libraries. Comments are added inline. Separate documentation is not yet complete.
